section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Drug crime" means:
a crime under this title; or
a crime committed in another jurisdiction that would be a crime under this title if committed in this State.
"Proceeds" means money or any other property with a value exceeding $10,000.

text.section: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, for purposes of this section each financial transaction is a separate violation.
